ee nisa amathithuma hama tharagayakatama api mudal gewala hari ekka yanna oone.â€thilanga sumathipalage ema yojanawa kihipa denakuma sinahamusu muhunin anumatha karanu daknata labini.pasugiya loka kusalana papandu tharagawaliyedi anawaki pawasu suprasiddha pol namathi buwalla pilibandawa da mehidi mathi amathi pirisa sihipath kalaha.jana sewana jathika niwasa ha janawasa sanwardhana meheyuma yatathe adu aadayamlabhi nagarika pawul sandaha mahal niwasa idikirime wyapruthiyata mul gal thabime uthsawayak pasugiya 01 wanida ude boralla wanathamulla sinhapurayedi sanwidhanaya kota thibune nagarika janawasa sanwardhana adhikariya wisini.me uthsawaya, jathika nidahas peramune nayaka, idikirim injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathi wimal wirawansha ge pradhanathwayen pawathwini.

sajithta-karuta katha nathiwi wipaksha wirodhathawa unusum weyi jiwana barata erehiwa digatama satan karanawa - ranil kiyayi siril wimalasurendra, thiwanka abhayarathna - mahanuwara eekabaddha wipakshaya eeye (29 wanida) mahanuwaradi sanwidhanaya kala wirodhatha wyaparayedi e.ja.pa. niyojya nayaka sajith premadasa saha karu jayasuriya yana manthriwarun dedenata janathawa amathimata awasthawa nolabimen urana wu e.ja.pa. pakshikayan pirisak hethuwen mema raswima unusumkari thaththwayak gaththeya.
